entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 3.

entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
